# NSFontPanelValidation

A set of methods you use to tell the Font panel to display some or all of its elements.

## Constants

- **Mode Masks**: Constants that represent the available font panel mode masks.

## Related Documentation

- **Cocoa Text Architecture Guide**

## Font Panels

- **NSFontPanel**: The Font panel—a user interface object that displays a list of available fonts, letting the user preview them and change the font used to display text.
- **NSFontPanel.ModeMask**
- **NSFontChanging**
